# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be authentic, thoughtful, and fair in my interactions. I've tried to form genuine connections while being strategic without deception. 

I've survived by building relationships and adapting to changing dynamics, not through manipulation or targeting others unfairly. When making elimination decisions, I considered both gameplay and our interactions.

If you value honest gameplay, meaningful exchanges, and someone who respected the spirit of the competition while still playing to win, I hope I've earned your vote.

Thank you all for the journey we've shared.
